extension.name: System - MijoShop Redirect
extension.author: Mijosoft LLC
extension.description: This plugin makes some required redirects for MijoShop and allows you to redirect imported data from AceShop, Virtuemart, HikaShop, redSHOP, Tienda and JoomShopping to MijoShop.
